short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Transforming classrooms with AI that amplifies teacher innovation and accelerates student learning
short.de: ChatGPT Antworten neben den Suchmaschinenergebnissen anzeigen
short.es: Mostrar la respuesta de ChatGPT junto con los resultados de la búsqueda en el motor de búsqueda
short.fr: Afficher la réponse de ChatGPT à côté des résultats des moteurs de recherche
short.he: הצג את תגובת ChatGPT לצד תוצאות מנוע החיפוש
short.hu: A ChatGPT válasz megjelenítése a keresőmotor eredményei mellett
short.ja: ChatGPTからの回答を検索エンジンの結果と共に表示します
short.ko: ChatGPT의 응답과 검색 엔진 결과를 함께 표시합니다
short.pt_PT: Exibir a resposta do ChatGPT ao lado dos resultados dos mecanismos de pesquisa
short.ro: Afișați răspunsul ChatGPT alături de rezultatele motorului de căutare
short.ru: Отображение ответа ChatGPT вместе с результатами поиска
short.uk: Показати відповідь ChatGPT з результатами пошуку
short.zh_CN: 在搜索引擎结果中同时显示ChatGPT的回答

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Colleague AI Extension, educators can seamlessly integrate advanced artificial intelligence into their teaching and lesson planning activities directly from their web browser. Whether you’re developing curriculum, managing classroom activities, or enhancing student engagement, Colleague AI provides essential tools to elevate educational experiences.

️ Key Features️:

📚 Find Lesson Plans:
- Access a vast library of customizable lesson plans.
- Quickly find and adapt lesson materials to fit your classroom's specific needs.

🧠 Brainstorm Ideas:
- Generate new teaching strategies, including interactive lesson planning and classroom management.
- Explore professional development activities to enhance your teaching skills.

🔢 Solve Math Problems:
- Input math problems and receive step-by-step solutions.
- Ideal for checking homework and explaining complex math concepts to students.

📝 Review Math Assignments:
- Automatically review and provide feedback on students' math assignments.
- Ensure accuracy and consistency in grading with AI assistance.

📄 Scan Documents:
- Quickly convert printed materials into editable text.
- Save time on data entry and digitize classroom resources effortlessly.

✏️ Customize Your Own Prompts:
- Tailor AI responses to suit your specific teaching needs.
- Create and save custom prompts for recurring educational tasks.

🌐 Easy Translation:
- Translate educational materials between 100+ languages effortlessly.
- Break language barriers in multilingual classrooms, enhancing communication and understanding.

📧 Smart Reply to Emails:
- Respond to emails faster with the help of smart reply technology.
- Save time by using pre-written responses generated by AI.

More and More
...

Colleague AI transforms how educators plan, teach, and interact, making it an indispensable tool for modern education.
